title: Rasa Magarasa Lyrics Mundasupatti Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Rasa Magarasa (duet version)
Singer(s): Rita, Anthony Dasan, Sean Roldan
Music: Sean Roldan
Movie: Mundasupatti

Rasa magaraasa engaiyyaa
un rasangam sarinjaacho sollaiyya.
kannodu nee irundha
kanmoodi yen parandha .
Rasa nee en rosa..

Rani magarani kalaivaani
en raathookkum paripochu marudhaani.
Ponnana un kadhil en aasa sonneney
rani nee en thaeni.

Yedho oru vaarththa sonnaayo
nee emanoda uravaada ninnaayo.
ayyo en peththa raasaave endhirikka maattaayo
rasa rasa rasa....

Nethaan enakkaaga varavenum
un nenjukkula idam onnu thara venum
unnoda oru vaarththa
ennoda maru vazhkka
neeyum naanum sera .

Kaalai enna maalai enna kaththirukka
kaalam neram enna poththirukka
allikolla pinnikolla.

Kaviyangal vandhu nindru pera solla
karanangal yedhum ingae theavayilla
kandukolla yedhumilla.

Thottaalum paravaadha noyamma
adhu vittaalum velagaadhu paarammaa.
dhegaththa pootti vaikkum
dhesaththa aati vaikkum
kadhal yedhu lesa ?

seo.description: Rasa Magarasa Lyrics Mundasupatti Song Lyrics - Tamil song lyrics from Mundasupatti
